lgtm ACK f1d7a6dfa1411ccf741fbf7351ea4f229dd1e63e

Not sure why and since when this is no longer needed. I am happy to bisect, if someone is interested.

> Not sure why and since when this is no longer needed. I am happy to bisect, if someone is interested.

From https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/b088062e687d95deff28b0715fd4859449b56584 it follows that it comes "from Boost Test code". CMake adds dependencies' include directories with `-isystem`, which effectively silences warnings.

It would be really nice to add comments for these in the future, whenever we add them. So it's clear when/why they can be removed.

(I guess git gave away the answer very quickly, but it'd be easier to eyeball and immediately understand if something's still relevant)
